entry.title: Hello Hexo
entry.content: 安装按照官网就可以我选择的主题是:next Config12345678910111213141516// Sitetitle: 琴声悠扬subtitle: As An Developer!description: 当你孤单你会想起谁?author: 琴声悠扬language: zh-Hanstimezone: Asia/Shanghaiavatar: /images/avatar.png 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 创建tags,categories生成index.htmlhexo new page "tags"title: Tagcloud date: 2014-12-22 12:39:04 type: “tags” hexo new page "categories"title: Tagcloud date: 2014-12-22 12:39:04 type: “categories” 注意打开menu菜单下的注释 hexo ghexo d 就可以了.
